module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *2.11.0.22* FREEPBX-7896 Backup email missing from Advanced Settings *2.11.0.21* FREEPBX-7842 *2.11.0.20* #7682 and #7433 *2.11.0.19* Skipped *2.11.0.18* #7347 *2.11.0.17* #7358 *2.11.0.16* #7383 *2.11.0.15* #7364 *2.11.0.14* #7354 *2.11.0.13* #7349 *2.11.0.12* #7300 *2.11.0.11* Fix License to be v3+ *2.11.0.10* #7239 *2.11.0.9* Generate a license file *2.11.0.8* #5832 Ensure AstDB is regenerated on restore *2.11.0.7* #7155 *2.11.0.6* #6380 *2.11.0.5* #6862, #6863 *2.11.0.4* #6761 *2.11.0.3* #6772 *2.11.0.2* #6730, #6549, #6553 *2.11.0.1* #6083 *2.11.0.0* #6555 *2.10.0.44* clarify Run label *2.10.0.43* clarify Run label *2.10.0.42* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.42 *2.10.0.41* re #6028 - restore backup to correct server *2.10.0.40* re #6028 - restore backup to correct server *2.10.0.39* Handel large settings db\'s with grace *2.10.0.38* Handel large settings db\'s with grace *2.10.0.37* Handel large settings db\'s with grace *2.10.0.36* re #5996 - use new restore script on remote restores *2.10.0.35* re #5991 - *2.10.0.34* re #5988 - Allow intercom beep to be configurable *2.10.0.33* re #5963 - Make backup suport backups > 2GB *2.10.0.32* version bump for file integrity *2.10.0.31* re #5823 - add more ssh port support; better handeling of backups > 2gb *2.10.0.31* re #5823 - add more ssh port support; better handeling of backups > 2gb *2.10.0.31* bug fixes *2.10.0.30* bug fixes *2.10.0.29* re #5907 - fix astdb backup/restore commands *2.10.0.28* #5871, #5823, #5615, #5825, #5573 *2.10.0.27* include core to allow trunks to be disabled *2.10.0.26* implement cdr restore *2.10.0.26* implement cdr restore *2.10.0.25* re #5659 - seems r14000 is missing a chunk of the fix. Here it is. *2.10.0.24* re #5659 - set correct path on local servers; fix array being passed in astdb excludes; visual improvement to run button onhover *2.10.0.23* r13797 was using wrong index *2.10.0.22* #5598 *2.10.0.21* revert (and improve) more of r13141 which broke restoring legacy backups *2.10.0.20* #5566 *2.10.0.19* #5618, add ability to disable registered trunks on restore *2.10.0.18* #5615, #5619, #5620 *2.10.0.17* #5607, #5612, fixes issues with remote restores also *2.10.0.16* #5598, #5599 *2.10.0.15* full template changes *2.10.0.14* bug fixes *2.10.0.13* bug fixes *2.10.0.12* bug fixes *2.10.0.11* bug fixes *2.10.0.10* bug fixes *2.10.0.9* improve eventstream log *2.10.0.8* bug fixes *2.10.0.7* bug fixes *2.10.0.6* fixed legacy restore and per file restore bugs *2.10.0.5* fixes upload and legacy restore *2.10.0.4* small, critical variable *2.10.0.3* misc bug fixes *2.10.0.2* #5418 *2.10.0.1* don't make jquery.jstree.min.js dynamic it blocks caching *2.10.0.0* Backup Module Rewrite
